abstract: Google and Yahoo have started testing ads with links to video that appear on search results pages. The challenge is to make sure the videos don’t distract from other ads or scare off users.
snippet: Google and Yahoo have started testing ads with links to video that appear on search results pages. The challenge is to make sure the videos don’t distract from other ads or scare off users.
lead_paragraph: Google and Yahoo have both started including video advertising on search results pages. Depending on how consumers react, this could open a vast new source of ad revenue or could deter users from clicking on the already incredibly lucrative text ads.

headline.main: Zen and the Delicate Art of Video on Search Pages
